titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the publiquf [sic] fast, March the eight in the afternoon, at St. Maries Oxford, before the members of the Honourable House of Commons there assembled by Henry Vaughan ... ; and printed by their order.
titleStmt.author: Vaughan, Henry, 1617 or 18-1661.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
